verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

זֹ֚את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise חֻקַּ֣ת <S%H2708><s%> chuk-Kat This [is] the ordinance הַתּוֹרָ֔ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah, of the law אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah hath commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying דַּבֵּ֣ר׀ <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְיִקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> ve-yik-Chu that they bring אֵלֶיךָ֩ <S%H413><s%> 'e-lei-Cha about פָרָ֨ה <S%H6510><s%> fa-Rah heifer אֲדֻמָּ֜ה <S%H122><s%> 'a-dum-Mah thee a red תְּמִימָ֗ה <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mah, without spot אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- is no בָּהּ֙ bah מ֔וּם <S%H3971><s%> Mum, wherein [is] no blemish אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- [and] upon which never עָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah came עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha and עֹֽל׃ <S%H5923><s%> 'Ol. yoke

וּנְתַתֶּ֣ם <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Tem And ye shall give אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah, אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar her unto Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen; the priest וְהוֹצִ֤יא <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-Tzi that he may bring her forth אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מִח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> lam-ma-cha-Neh, the camp וְשָׁחַ֥ט <S%H7819><s%> ve-sha-Chat and [one] shall slay אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav. her before

וְלָקַ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-Kach shall take אֶלְעָזָ֧ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar And Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest מִדָּמָ֖הּ <S%H1818><s%> mid-da-Mah of her blood בְּאֶצְבָּע֑וֹ <S%H676><s%> be-'etz-ba-'O; with his finger וְהִזָּ֞ה <S%H5137><s%> ve-hiz-Zah and sprinkle אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward נֹ֨כַח <S%H5227><s%> No-chach directly פְּנֵ֧י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei before אֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> 'o-hel- the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֛ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed of the congregation מִדָּמָ֖הּ <S%H1818><s%> mid-da-Mah of her blood שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' seven פְּעָמִֽים׃ <S%H6471><s%> pe-'a-Mim. times

וְשָׂרַ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> ve-sa-Raf And [one] shall burn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַפָּרָ֖ה <S%H6510><s%> hap-pa-Rah the heifer לְעֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nav; in his sight אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֹרָ֤הּ <S%H5785><s%> 'o-Rah her skin וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בְּשָׂרָהּ֙ <S%H1320><s%> be-sa-Rah and her flesh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et דָּמָ֔הּ <S%H1818><s%> da-Mah, and her blood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- with פִּרְשָׁ֖הּ <S%H6569><s%> pir-Shah with her dung יִשְׂרֹֽף׃ <S%H8313><s%> yis-Rof. shall he burn

וְלָקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-Kach shall take הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, And the priest עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz wood אֶ֛רֶז <S%H730><s%> 'E-rez cedar וְאֵז֖וֹב <S%H231><s%> ve-'e-Zov and hyssop וּשְׁנִ֣י <S%H8144><s%> u-she-Ni and scarlet תוֹלָ֑עַת <S%H8438><s%> to-La-'at; oppressor וְהִשְׁלִ֕יךְ <S%H7993><s%> ve-hish-Lich and cast אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into תּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> Toch [it] into the midst שְׂרֵפַ֥ת <S%H8316><s%> se-re-Fat of the burning הַפָּרָֽה׃ <S%H6510><s%> hap-pa-Rah. of the heifer

וְכִבֶּ֨ס <S%H3526><s%> ve-chib-Bes shall wash בְּגָדָ֜יו <S%H899><s%> be-ga-Dav his clothes הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, Then the priest וְרָחַ֤ץ <S%H7364><s%> ve-ra-Chatz and he shall bathe בְּשָׂרוֹ֙ <S%H1320><s%> be-sa-Ro his flesh בַּמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> bam-Ma-yim, in water וְאַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char and afterward יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo he shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh; into the camp וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> ve-ta-Me shall be unclean הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen and the priest עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> ha-'A-rev. until the even

וְהַשֹּׂרֵ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> ve-has-so-Ref And he that burneth אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah, יְכַבֵּ֤ס <S%H3526><s%> ye-chab-Bes her shall wash בְּגָדָיו֙ <S%H899><s%> be-ga-Dav his clothes בַּמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> bam-Ma-yim, in water וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> ve-ra-Chatz and bathe בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <S%H1320><s%> be-sa-Ro his flesh בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> bam-Ma-yim; in water וְטָמֵ֖א <S%H2930><s%> ve-ta-Me and shall be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> ha-'A-rev. until the even

וְאָסַ֣ף׀ <S%H622><s%> ve-'a-Saf shall gather אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And a man טָה֗וֹר <S%H2889><s%> ta-Hor, [that is] clean אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֵ֣פֶר <S%H665><s%> 'E-fer up the ashes הַפָּרָ֔ה <S%H6510><s%> hap-pa-Rah, of the heifer וְהִנִּ֛יחַ <S%H3240><s%> ve-hin-Ni-ach and lay [them] up מִח֥וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> lam-ma-cha-Neh the camp בְּמָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> be-ma-Kom place טָה֑וֹר <S%H2889><s%> ta-Hor; in a clean וְ֠הָיְתָה <S%H1961><s%> Ve-ha-ye-tah become לַעֲדַ֨ת <S%H5712><s%> la-'a-Dat for the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְמִשְׁמֶ֛רֶת <S%H4931><s%> le-mish-Me-ret and it shall be kept לְמֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> le-Mei for a water נִדָּ֖ה <S%H5079><s%> nid-Dah of separation חַטָּ֥את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tat it [is] a purification for sin הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> hi he

וְ֠כִבֶּס <S%H3526><s%> Ve-chib-bes shall wash הָאֹסֵ֨ף <S%H622><s%> ha-'o-Sef And he that gathereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֵ֤פֶר <S%H665><s%> 'E-fer the ashes הַפָּרָה֙ <S%H6510><s%> hap-pa-Rah of the heifer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּגָדָ֔יו <S%H899><s%> be-ga-Dav, his clothes וְטָמֵ֖א <S%H2930><s%> ve-ta-Me and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הָעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> ha-'A-rev; until the even וְֽהָיְתָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah become לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei and it shall be unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְלַגֵּ֛ר <S%H1616><s%> ve-lag-Ger and unto the stranger הַגָּ֥ר <S%H1481><s%> hag-Gar that sojourneth בְּתוֹכָ֖ם <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cham among לְחֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> le-chuk-Kat them for a statute עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. for ever

הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> han-no-Ge-a' He that toucheth בְּמֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> be-Met the dead לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol of any נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh body אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam; of any man וְטָמֵ֖א <S%H2930><s%> ve-ta-Me shall be unclean שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. days

ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu one יִתְחַטָּא־ <S%H2398><s%> yit-chat-ta- He shall purify ב֞וֹ vo בַּיּ֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֛י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi himself with it on the third וּבַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-vai-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I and on the seventh יִטְהָ֑ר <S%H2891><s%> yit-Har; he shall be clean וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> lo from יִתְחַטָּ֜א <S%H2398><s%> yit-chat-Ta but if he purify בַּיּ֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֛י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi not himself the third וּבַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-vai-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I then the seventh לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִטְהָֽר׃ <S%H2891><s%> yit-Har. he shall not be clean

כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- Anyone הַנֹּגֵ֡עַ <S%H5060><s%> han-no-Ge-a' Whosoever toucheth בְּמֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> be-Met the dead בְּנֶפֶשׁ֩ <S%H5315><s%> be-ne-Fesh body הָאָדָ֨ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam of any man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יָמ֜וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut that is dead וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and does not יִתְחַטָּ֗א <S%H2398><s%> yit-chat-Ta, and purifieth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִשְׁכַּ֤ן <S%H4908><s%> mish-Kan the tabernacle יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God טִמֵּ֔א <S%H2930><s%> tim-Me, not himself defileth וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <S%H3772><s%> ve-nich-re-Tah shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> han-Ne-fesh and that soul הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv he מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> mi-Yis-ra-'El; from Israel כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki Because מֵ֨י <S%H4325><s%> mei because the water נִדָּ֜ה <S%H5079><s%> nid-Dah of separation לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- was not זֹרַ֤ק <S%H2236><s%> zo-Rak was not sprinkled עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav on טָמֵ֣א <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me upon him he shall be unclean יִהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh, become ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od is still טֻמְאָת֥וֹ <S%H2932><s%> tum-'a-To his uncleanness בֽוֹ׃ vo.

זֹ֚את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise הַתּוֹרָ֔ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah, This [is] the law אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam when a man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- when יָמ֣וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut dieth בְּאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> be-'O-hel; in a tent כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- everyone הַבָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> hab-Ba all that come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הָאֹ֙הֶל֙ <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel into the tent וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and everyone אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בָּאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> ba-'O-hel, and all that [is] in the tent יִטְמָ֖א <S%H2930><s%> yit-Ma shall be unclean שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. days

וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol Every כְּלִ֣י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Li vessel פָת֔וּחַ <S%H6605><s%> fa-Tu-ach, And every open אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- has צָמִ֥יד <S%H6781><s%> tza-Mid which hath no covering פָּתִ֖יל <S%H6616><s%> pa-Til bound עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav; on טָמֵ֖א <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me upon it [is] unclean הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he
